attributes.action: Free transport for NHS and other key workers during the Covid-19 outbreak
attributes.additional_details: As a way of showing gratitude and in order to make these days a little easier, I believe that transport should be free for key workers who are tirelessly helping the community during these challenging times.
attributes.background:
NHS employees are and will be working extremely hard and putting their own health at risk to fight the Coronavirus outbreak in the next few weeks. 
Other key workers such as cleaners, supermarket staff and childcare providers, will also allow us to focus on saving lives and the country to function.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305801

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
